results.content:
Going great!, love the way Author have created reusable component/pipe/directives really useful, 

Simplifying something  doesn't mean it's basic concept ( seen some negative review saying its basic concept ) 

If you able to accomplish the job mostly with css do it as it more (100% better than js ) performant,  use JS only when thing can not be done with css. Author explained well this separation concept, Great content!

results.content:
I really enjoyed this course. It is informative, clear, understandable. The course covers the most common situations that I meet in front-end development using the Angular and Ionic stacks.
The course is worth time and effort spent! I will recommend it to my friends. Thanks Dylan!
results.content_html:

The course is worth time and effort spent! I will recommend it to my friends. Thanks Dylan!

results.content: Great exercise to understand Angular and it’s structure!
results.content_html: Great exercise to understand Angular and it’s structure!

results.content:
The idea behind the course in interesting and that's what got me to buy the course, but the teacher is not very knowledgeable about angular and there aren't even actually 100 "challenges".

Also the presentation is very bad and not well organized (I especially love the 2 videos with him in that horrid sleeveless shirt...), he even makes mistakes and lets you watch as he tried to figure out where he messed up instead of cutting that from the video

Very disappointing, not worth the purchase, please do not buy this!
results.content_html:

results.content: Don't waste money on this course it is for absolute beginners and it is not by angular style guide, it is created by Dylans style guide.
results.content_html: Don't waste money on this course it is for absolute beginners and it is not by angular style guide, it is created by Dylans style guide.

results.content:
I don't think I've ever left 1star about any course on Udemy, nor left negative comments, but this course's instructor deserve.

I must say worst course I've ever had on Udemy. Please do not get this course in case of you have even higher intermediate level of Angular. Don't waste your time & money, you can learn these things easily from another platform like YTb.

results.content: Great lecture! I love this course more than other courses which are just teaching grammars.

results.content: good but need challenges more implementation in real time like jwt, pagination, etc...

results.content: Excellent course. Still going through it, but it's been very helpful and I definitely recommend!
results.content_html: Excellent course. Still going through it, but it's been very helpful and I definitely recommend!

results.content: This course is by far one of the best if not the best course on Angular just by the sheer amount of practice projects you get. The way you improve in web development is by doing projects and this course definitely delivers. If you are looking for a course to improve your typescript and Angular skills then hop on in...I am hoping for a few more full projects like a PWA or portfolio! Keep up the good work!
